name: UIPreviewAction.Style
desc: The style for a peek quick action. Use these styles with instances of the UIPreviewAction and UIPreviewActionGroup classes.

items.name: case selected
items.desc: The style for a selected peek quick action. Use this style for the initially-selected item within a disclosed peek quick action group.

items.name: case destructive
items.desc: The style for a peek quick action that changes or deletes data.
